item.title: Python vs Punch Out
item.description:
Description

Python has a wide array of A.I tools to handle all kinds of problems -- leading one Python enthusiast to wonder, "Can Python build a better video game player than me?"

Greg Hahn will explore the use of NEAT-python, a neural-network focused module to see if it can learn to, and eventually master, the Nintendo game of Punch Out.
item.dc:creator: Greg Hahn
